# subscript(_:_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Provides a bindable value for the given name.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency subscript<T>(name: String, type: T.Type = T.self) -> BindableValue<T>? where T : BindableData { get set }
```
